name: Time Skippy
description:
Skippy's in trouble!

Move ONE SECOND at a time
Grab WEAPONS
Fight BADDIES
You only get ONE SHOT

--- CONTROLS ---

Left Click / Left CTRL to SHOOT
Right Click / Spacebar to MOVE

--- CREDITS ---

CODE & DESIGN by Rook @itsmeagentv
ART & DESIGN by EZ @fabulashp

ADDITIONAL SPRITES by Oryx Design Labs
FONTS by Chevy Ray
MUSIC by Kevin MacLeod

Made for GMTK Jam 2019!
